Draw a Hexagon

Draw a Hexagon

draw_hex(area = hex_area(1), offset_x = 0, offset_y = 0, id = 1,
  tessellate = F)

Arguments

area

Area of the hexagon
offset_x

Hexagons from the origin on the x-axis to draw hexagon
offset_y

Hexagons from the origin on the y-axis to draw hexagon
id

Hexagon ID
tessellate

Boolean, if TRUE then will offset by distance of the centre of the side to the centre of the hexagon

Value

A Polygon object with area specified above and drawn as specified by the offset

Examples


hex <- draw_hex(area=5)
plot(SpatialPolygons(list(hex)))
#> Error in SpatialPolygons(list(hex)): could not find function "SpatialPolygons"
